entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • How to seamlessly swap NuGet packages with source? #7334
    Backlog
  • Why does dotnet publish include files like Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.dll? #44579

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • NETSDK1221 warning for wpftmp.csproj projects #44605
  • dotnet format won't newline an empty catch block #44564
  • CLI - dotnet workload restore fails on solution if there is a .esproj project #44587
  • SDK doesn't find/use bundled library-packs when additional NuGet sources are specified. #44547
  • .NET to COM/ActiveX - params/ParamArray not supported for VB98/VB6 and earlier #44460
  • Assembly Version Conflict: Targeted net8.0-ios17.2 Project Fails with Microsoft.iOS, Version=18.0.0.0 Dependency Mismatch #44388
  • Weird progress indicators started appearing in stdout #44610
  • Errors occur when run dotnet cli on Windows with sudo. #44576
  • Should platform package pruning data represent GA of a framework or the serviced version? #44566
  • Directory.Build.props seems to write all of my intermediate files in the wrong location. #12064
  • dotnet test hangs with .NET9 RC1/RC2 in CI build on Ubuntu #43432
  • `slnx` support in the `dotnet` CLI #40913
    9.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Invoke dotnet nuget why directly through API #44614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • vmr to macos-13 #44628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When updating workload versions, don't try to update to an older version, or to the same version currently installed #43931

Updated

  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-list: Support for slnx #44537
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Set mediaType from http response if manifest mediaType is not present #44530
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, Branch Lockdown
  • Browser refresh and WASM delta applier refactoring #44539
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #44612
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dotnet test integration #44268
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [FIX] tool-install: Use RestoreActionConfig options #44487
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add MSTest among common templates #44523
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #44540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
